item.title: 99 Dungeoneering
item.dc:creator: @Pzezima2 Pzezima2
item.description:
@Pzezima2 wrote:

[quote=“Jerico Pimpinbro, post:62, topic:400061”][quote author=Pzezima2 link=topic=497156.msg3640868#msg3640868 date=1308994639]
Let me explain.

Someone has hacked my account, meaning they changed my recov, email and passwords.
There is no way of me getting it back, Fagex wont give it back,

So im stuck using this peice of shit account botting every skills trying to get money…

Fucken Fagex has fucked me over again.
[/quote]

Wrong. Recovery questions take 14 days to delete. You claim you were hacked on June 25th. They didn’t delete the recovery questions. You are lying by stating that they did. Had they attempted to change your e-mail, you would have received an e-mail to confirm the switch.

Now, even through all of this, had you had an e-mail set you would have been accepted in a few seconds if you had an e-mail set and the recovery attempt was submitted from the IP address mainly logged into the account.

Jagex is capable of knowing who the original owner is based on the information and your ip address.

Furthermore, the account wasn’t/isn’t/will never be yours. My assumption is you purchased it and are lying about getting hacked.[/quote]

Gee… way to grave dig mate. ive gotten over it as you should assumed by all the post about me creating a new account and starting over again?

DevilsCape:

Dungeoneering lvl now?

62

Read full topic

item.title: 99 Dungeoneering
item.dc:creator: @Jerico_Pimpinbro Jerico Pimpinbro
item.description:
@Jerico_Pimpinbro wrote:

[quote=“Pzezima2, post:41, topic:400061”]Let me explain.

Someone has hacked my account, meaning they changed my recov, email and passwords.
There is no way of me getting it back, Fagex wont give it back,

So im stuck using this peice of shit account botting every skills trying to get money…

Fucken Fagex has fucked me over again.[/quote]

Wrong. Recovery questions take 14 days to delete. You claim you were hacked on June 25th. They didn’t delete the recovery questions. You are lying by stating that they did. Had they attempted to change your e-mail, you would have received an e-mail to confirm the switch.

Now, even through all of this, had you had an e-mail set you would have been accepted in a few seconds if you had an e-mail set and the recovery attempt was submitted from the IP address mainly logged into the account.

Jagex is capable of knowing who the original owner is based on the information and your ip address.

Furthermore, the account wasn’t/isn’t/will never be yours. My assumption is you purchased it and are lying about getting hacked.

Read full topic
